name: Fadel Gamescage and The Hypeland Blitz
name_original: Fadel Gamescage and The Hypeland Blitz
description:
Fadel GamesCage and The Hypeland Blitz is an action platformer set in a fantasy world based on the vibe and community of the GamesCage Twitch channel and Twitter page. 

This game is a sequel to the first Fadel fangame produced by JoeTSN, GamesCage Simulator 2022. This new game begins with Fadel being sucked into Hypeland, the world inside the GamesCage, after a stream one day. Your job is to help him fight his way to freedom!

CONTROLS: Keyboard and Mouse are recommended for full functionality, but a Controller can be used.

CREDITS: Accessible in the in-game menu under Options > Credits.

Gameplay Tutorial: (Available at 8pm EST on August 26th, 2022)
